controller

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.LoginController

  • public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
    Receives information from the LoginView, and relays it to the database. Controls the navigation to the MainView.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) javafx.scene.control.TextField emailTextField
      The Email Text Field from the LoginView
      (package private) javafx.scene.control.PasswordField passwordTextField
      The Password Text Field from the LoginView

    • Method Detail

      • userInfoValid

        private boolean userInfoValid(java.lang.String email,
                              java.lang.String password)
        Checks if the given email exists, and verifies that the password matches the one in the database.
        Parameters:
        email - - user email to check
        password - - user password entered
        Returns:
        True if valid, False if not

      • retrieveUserInfo

        private java.lang.String[] retrieveUserInfo(java.lang.String email)
        Parameters:
        email - - the email of the user
        Returns:
        A two element array containing the user's email ([0]) and password ([1]) in the database

      • login

        public void login(javafx.event.ActionEvent loginButtonPressed)
        Gets the text from the email and password fields in the LoginView. If this info is valid, it navigates to the MainView, else displays an error. Also initializes the User's recentlyViewedStocks from storage.
        Parameters:
        loginButtonPressed - - the ActionEvent from the login button.

      • initializeRecentlyViewedStocks

        private LimitedSizeStockQueue initializeRecentlyViewedStocks(java.lang.String email)
        Initializes the User's recentlyViewedStocks queue from the save file. If the user does not have a save file, it returns a new empty LimitedSizeStockQueue.
        Parameters:
        email - User's email
        Returns:
        LimitedSizeStockQueue containing the User's saved recentlyViewedStocks.

      • register

        public void register(javafx.event.ActionEvent registerButtonPressed)
        Gets the text from the email and password fields in the LoginView. Checks if the email is already used in the system, and displays an error if it is. For new emails, it writes to the database, and logs in the user.
        Parameters:
        registerButtonPressed - - the ActionEvent from the register button

      • navigateToMain

        private void navigateToMain(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Loads an instance of the MainView, sets the size, and displays it to the user.
        Parameters:
        event - - ActionEvent passed to it from the login() method

      • displayError

        private void displayError(java.lang.String content)
        Displays an Alert to the user containing the specified content.
        Parameters:
        content - - string that will be displayed
